remarks: Eliminate an atom not under a lattice hyperplane.  TODO:  Look at proofs using ~ lhpmat to see if this can be used to shorten them.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2013.)
statement:
lhpelim.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpelim.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpelim.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhpelim.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhpelim.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhpelim.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpelim $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( P .\/ ( X ./\ W ) ) ./\ W ) = ( X ./\ W ) ) $.
